ygData.subject: Re: Halo of Light spell
ygData.msgSnippet: The halo of light spell can be found in Felwithe... I believe that is where I got mine. Also anyone on Xegony interested in teaching me a few languages??
ygData.messageBody:
The halo of light spell can be found in Felwithe... I believe that is where I
got mine.
Also anyone on Xegony interested in teaching me a few languages??

~~Farwen "Mightyraven" Ohtarin~~
The Ravenwalker
Wizard of the 18th level (soon)
